Uses of Package
net.wstech2.me.httpsclient

  • Classes in net.wstech2.me.httpsclient used by net.wstech2.me.httpsclient 
    Class and Description
    CertificateErrorHandler
    Defines a callback method to be invoke when the certificate sent by the server is determined to be invalid, i.e.:
    - the public key correspondent to the C.A.'
    CertificateStore
    CertificateStore interacts with the Certificate Authorities repository, providing methods for insertion, removal, deletion and maintenance of the stored certificates.
    CertificateValidationException
    Represents an exception occurred during the certificate validation process.
    CertificateValidator
    Validates a certificate chain against a external keystore (either the record store or a file embed in the jar).
    HttpsConnectionImpl
    HttpsConnectionImpl is an alternative implementation for the HttpsConnection interface.
